TopicTitle: Challenge: build the cheapest ClassA asteroid wrangler

Articles.Content:
so far, I've only been able to get a functional one for a little over 400k and I can't figure out how to go any lower.

I'm wondering if anyone else is able to do it? if so, please post pics or video.

As a heads-up for you: we have a special Challenge subforum for things like that, with a crowd of regulars who are always looking for a new way to test their building and flying skills.

When you post there, it's customary to post proof of your own attempts (or promise to do so after a few entrants, if your attempt is spoileriffic) and to be precise about the requirements. Class A asteroids come in different weights, better be specific; do you mean only the wrangler itself, or also the launch stages that lift it off of Kerbin; etc.
Both wrangler and launch. but thanks, I'll check out the forum. where's the delete button?
We can move this over to the right forum or lock it for you to create a new thread, up to you. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
No thanks, just feed this thread to the Krakken, I've changed my mind.
